function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Data underestimates true sales figures and installed base of robots","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of robot adoption and its impact on the economy","Mitigation":"Implement methods to adjust for underestimation and use additional sources of data","Technologies":"Data analytics, machine learning, artificial intelligence","People":"Economists, policy makers, researchers","Owner":"Data analysts, economists, researchers"},{"Description":"Lack of robot data beyond 2018 limits the analysis of pandemic impact on robot adoption","Impact":"Inability to assess the full impact of pandemics on robot adoption over the medium term","Mitigation":"Seek alternative sources of robot data beyond 2018, estimate the impact based on available data","Technologies":"Data extrapolation, statistical modeling","People":"Data analysts, economists, researchers","Owner":"Data analysts, researchers"},{"Description":"Industry-level labor and capital-related data available only until 2014, limiting the analysis of pandemic impact","Impact":"Incomplete assessment of the impact of pandemics on the industry labor and capital-related data","Mitigation":"Use alternative proxy variables to capture the impact of pandemics on labor and capital-related data","Technologies":"Statistical modeling, data analysis","People":"Economists, industry analysts, policy makers","Owner":"Data analysts, industry analysts"}]}
